title: Wishing for You
description: She’s a girl who can’t remember. He’s the guy she can’t forget…It's her final semester of high school, and KimberleyRey is curious about what will come next. She needs topick a college, but her memory disability complicatesthe choice. Will her struggles to remember make it impossibleto leave home?Help arrives through an unexpected and supernaturalgift. Grant is a "genie" with rules. He can give herthirty wishes (one per day for a month) as long as thetasks are humanly possible. Kimberley knows just whatto ask for--lessons in how to live on her own.But her wishes change when a friend receives a devastatingdiagnosis. As she joins forces with Grant to helpher friend, Kimberley learns that the ability to live inthe moment--to forget--may be more valuable thanshe knew.
author: Elizabeth Langston
